channel.title: Need help with open port
channel.description: ok well here is my issue i am using the usual port (43594) so i go to "canyouseeme.org" type in my port. and it says connection refused. do i just have to hook up to wires? cuss i am on wireless right now REPLYS WOULD BE NICE :rolleyes:

item.title: Need help with open port
item.dc:creator: @cloudslife cloudslife
item.description:
@cloudslife wrote:

ok to cheack to see if your port is open is very very easy!
( im also wireless hosting 24/7)

ok some qustins pop up.

did you portforward?
if you did well then you need to use this download from portfarward.com…
http://portforward.com/help/portcheck.htm

If it is open then this will tell you if it says its not well you did something wrong portforwarding.

If you need to port forward this is how…
Steps…
1.- go to http://portforward.com/ ( skip any ads that might pop up on the site)

2.- click on Router List and look for your router. ( you need one! if your wireless you need to be linked to it,
you will need to go on its control pannal.

3.- once you find your router you should go to the Port List.
once there you need to find the R area and near the bottom of the R’s you will see runescape private server, click on it!

4.-once done with that you need to folo the tut thats on the site on how to inport the 43594 onto your router/port.

5.- once done just download the port checker then see if its open…
and then you should be done!

if you need anything just E-mail me. (i do have MSN.)

E-mail - Runescape317cloud@hotmail.com

Read full topic
